description:
Lilim is one of the demons summoned by http://anidb.net/ch51993 [Kujou Hinako], and appears to be her demon of choice. Hinako orders her to catch http://anidb.net/ch51994 [Wakui Keita] as he falls from the stairs in Festgate, "averting" his Death Clip. She then helps fend off the demons as the party searches for the hacker.
Source: Megami Tensei Wiki
name: Lilim
